argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | coe1mul.s | |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | coe1mul.t | |- .xb = ( .r ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | coe1mul.u | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | coe1mul.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 1, 4 | #P_ply1bascl | |- ( F e. B -> F e. ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 4 | #P_ply1bascl | |- ( G e. B -> G e. ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` R ) = ( PwSer1 ` R ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPwSer R ) = ( 1o mPwSer R ) |
| 11 | 1, 9, 2 | #P_ply1mulr | |- .xb = ( .r ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_mplmulr | |- .xb = ( .r ` ( 1o mPwSer R ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( .r ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 8, 10, 13 | #P_psr1mulr | |- ( .r ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( .r ` ( 1o mPwSer R ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_eqtr4i | |- .xb = ( .r ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 15, 3, 16 | #P_coe1mul2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) /\ G e. ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) ) -> ( coe1 ` ( F .xb G ) ) = ( k e. NN0 |-> ( R gsum ( x e. ( 0 ... k ) |-> ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` x ) .x. ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` ( k - x ) ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 5, 6, 7, 17 | #P_syl3an | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` ( F .xb G ) ) = ( k e. NN0 |-> ( R gsum ( x e. ( 0 ... k ) |-> ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` x ) .x. ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` ( k - x ) ) ) ) ) ) ) |
